content.raw:
This is [failing on OSX](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/2666/testReport/junit/(root)/LogSystemTest/LogResources/), probably because the command line tool is used:

```
/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/test/integration/log_system.cc:1736
Value of: common::exists(consolePath)
  Actual: false
Expected: true
```

@{mabelmzhang} , how about disabling this test on APPLE and creating another test that records resources, but using `ServerConfig` instead? That should work on OSX.
content.html:
This is failing on OSX, probably because the command line tool is used:

/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/test/integration/log_system.cc:1736
Value of: common::exists(consolePath)
  Actual: false
Expected: true

@Mabel Zhang , how about disabling this test on APPLE and creating another test that records resources, but using ServerConfig instead? That should work on OSX.
